## RumInitConfiguration.subdomain property

If you are accessing Datadog through a custom subdomain, you can set `subdomain` to include your custom domain in the `getSessionReplayLink()` returned URL . See <a href="https://docs.datadoghq.com/real_user_monitoring/guide/connect-session-replay-to-your-third-party-tools">Connect Session Replay To Your Third-Party Tools</a> for further information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
subdomain?: string;
```
